Package com.espertech.esper.event.xml

XML event wrappers

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DOMPropertyGetter Shortcut-getter for DOM underlying objects.
FragmentFactory Factory for event fragments for use with DOM getters.
SchemaElement Schema element is a simple or complex element.
SchemaItem Marker interface for a schema (simple or complex) element or attribute.
 

Class Summary
BaseXMLEventType Base class for XML event types.
DOMAttributeAndElementGetter Getter for both attribute and element values, attributes are checked first.
DOMComplexElementGetter Getter for a DOM complex element.
DOMConvertingArrayGetter Getter for converting a Node child nodes into an array.
DOMConvertingGetter Getter for parsing node content to a desired type.
DOMIndexedGetter Getter for retrieving a value at a certain index.
DOMMapGetter DOM getter for Map-property.
DOMNestedPropertyGetter Getter for nested properties in a DOM tree.
DOMSimpleAttributeGetter Getter for simple attributes in a DOM node.
FragmentFactoryDOMGetter Factory for fragments for DOM getters.
FragmentFactoryXPathPredefinedGetter Fragment factory for use with XPath explicit properties.
NamespaceNamePair Pair of namespace and name.
PropertyResolutionResult Result of a property resolution.
SchemaElementComplex Represents a complex element possibly with attributes, simple elements, other complex child elements and may itself have a simple type.
SchemaElementSimple Represents a simple value in a schema.
SchemaItemAttribute Represents an attribute in a schema.
SchemaModel Represents a XSD schema or other metadata for a class of XML documents.
SchemaUtil Utility class for querying schema information via Xerces implementation classes.
SchemaXMLEventType EventType for xml events that have a Schema.
SchemaXMLPropertyParser Parses event property names and transforms to XPath expressions using the schema information supplied.
SimpleXMLEventType Optimistic try to resolve the property string into an appropiate xPath, and use it as getter.
SimpleXMLPropertyParser Parses event property names and transforms to XPath expressions.
XMLEventBean EventBean wrapper for XML documents.
XPathNamespaceContext Provides the namespace context information for compiling XPath expressions.
XPathPropertyArrayItemGetter Getter for XPath explicit properties returning an element in an array.
XPathPropertyGetter Getter for properties of DOM xml events.
XSDSchemaMapper Helper class for mapping a XSD schema model to an internal representation.
 

Package com.espertech.esper.event.xml Description

XML event wrappers
